EmailTemplate.name: 2016 inquiry follow up
EmailTemplate.subject: We want to hear from you – your feedback is important to us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for the opportunity to assist you with your recent inquiry. We would very much appreciate your feedback regarding your experience with Five Star Professional. Please take a moment to complete our brief survey and let us know how we did.
We thank you in advance for sharing your thoughts with us. If you have any questions about this survey, or if you need further assistance, please don’t hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards,
Teresa Hemingson
Manager, Client Experience and Delivery Five Star Professional
Phone: 888-438-5782
Email: clientservices@fivestarprofessional.com
